body.p: In developing the 2018 Conceptual Framework, the Board did not provide detailed guidance on when a particular measurement basis would be suitable because the suitability of particular measurement bases will vary depending on facts and circumstances. Instead, the 2018 Conceptual Framework:

li.p: describes measurement bases and the information they provide; and
discusses the factors to consider when selecting a measurement basis.
